```{r setup}
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
data.frame(
  x = c(10, 80, 10, 50),
  y = c(90, 90, 283, 283),
  cit = c("a", "a", "b", "b"),
  position = c("start", "end", "start", "end")
) -> lines

lines[which(lines$position == "end"), ] -> points

ggplot() +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 10) +
  geom_line(
    data = lines,
    aes(x = x, y = y, group = cit)
  ) + 
  geom_point(
    data = points,
    aes(x = x, y = y, fill = cit),
    shape = 21,
    size = 6,
    stroke = 0.75
  ) +
  geom_text(
    data = points,
    aes(x = x, y = y, label = cit),
    size = 4
  ) +
  xlim(c(0, 100)) +
  ylim(c(0, 360)) +
  coord_polar("y") -> base

base
```

```{r}
base + 
  theme_void() +
  theme(
    legend.position = "none"
  ) 
```
